strIntroduction: The fastest way to see Ibiza is with our thrilling and action-packed speedboat adventure, which zooms along either the north or south coast, exploring beaches, coves, caves, reefs and much, much more. Join us for this exciting two-hour jaunt and discover parts of the island that few visitors ever have the chance to see.
Cooltra is the leading scooter rental company in Spain. Take advantage of the freedom a scooter gives you and discover places a conventional tourist will miss.

Explore the capital of Mallorca at your own pace with a 7-day Las Palmas Card and get free admission to more than 20 attractions, along with discounts on shopping, at restaurants and selected bars. Discover the home of Christopher Columbus, and more.

Learn how to cook an authentic Valencian paella in the home of the traditional Spanish paella. Visit the Valencia Central Market to learn about the ingredients necessary to make a traditional paella and then participate in a small group paella making competition before having the chance to try your own creation, as well as other authentic tapas.

Just two nautical miles south of Ibiza is the stunning and virtually unspoiled island of Formentera, one of the few remaining secrets of not just the Balearics but the whole of Europe. A visit to this idyllic hideaway is the icing on the cake of any Ibiza holiday.
strTitle: Formentera ferry ticket from San Antonio

strIntroduction: This amusement park has been wowing locals and visitors alike since the Swinging Sixties.

Located in the historical section of Ronda town, in a palace-like house with more than a thousand years of history. The old wine cellar has been transformed into a marvellous museum featuring twelve thematic rooms. Each invites the visitor to discover through the history and culture of wine, a product strongly present in Spanish society and associated to mythology and religion, and whose elaboration is a process of traditional work both in the countryside and in the wine cellar.
Learn about San Sebastian's history and Basque culture on a half-day guided tour while sampling the city's best pintxos (Basque tapas) and wines
strTitle: San Sebastian Tapas Walking Small group tour

strIntroduction: Understand more about the diverse nature of life on Earth and the mysterious manner
Choose among imaginative routes, on board a state-of-the-art machine and get to know Madrid the way it deserves to be visited.

Fashionistas, bargain hunters and shopaholics can indulge in some retail therapy in the renowned Las Rozas Village, a chic outlet shopping experience without equal. The mall is about 30 minutes away from the capital and there are three departures daily from central Madrid.
Villa Rosa Madrid offers the widest and most dynamic show schedule with the best flamenco singers, dancers and guitar players. Taste it along with a delicious Spanish dinner for a full-on experience.

Do you want to gaze at the wide variety of flora and fauna of the Canarian archipelago? Plunge into the waters of the Atlantic Ocean and relish on the best diving activities at Gran Canaria. A refreshingly fun activity: an innovative way to discover the natural wealth of the island.
This full day sightseeing tour is ideal for anybody wishing to see the main attractions of Barcelona in a day

Sample traditional Dutch food and drink on a food tour of picturesque Amsterdam. Try salty edam and smoky gouda cheeses, learn about the city’s spice trade at a spice house, and visit a 17th-century distillery to sip on some hard liquor.

Discover Bruges – one of the most captivating cities in Belgium – on this day trip from Amsterdam. After traveling to Bruges by coach, you will receive a brief overview of city sights from your knowledgeable guide. Then, enjoy 5 full hours exploring the churches, canals and lace shops of Bruges on your own. See the Begijnhof, the city gates and the eye-catching windmills. And indulge in some delicious Belgian chocolates on your ride back to Amsterdam!
Experience that ultimate Amsterdam night out that you have been waiting all your life.
Explore Amsterdam the ‘Dutch way’ – by bike! Following an expert local guide, enjoy a leisurely 3-hour bike ride around Amsterdam’s typically flat and open city streets – perfect for cycling!

Getting around Amsterdam is a breeze with a hop-on hop-off Canal Bus Day Pass. The boats operate a regular service along Amsterdam's canals, following four routes: the Green Line, Red Line, Blue Line and Orange Line. While you cruise, an on-board commentary provides interesting information about Amsterdam.

Explore Amsterdam’s Red Light District at night, when it truly comes alive. Your resident guide will show you the secret areas, and the back alleys of De Wallen. Visit coffee shops, meet local workers, and finish off at Cafe Remember with shots.
strTitle: Amsterdam Red Light District Walking Tour

strIntroduction: We the solution for all your group transfers from and to Schiphol Airport Amsterdam and Amsterdam City Centre

Sit back and relax on a 2-hour candlelight cruise along Amsterdam's famous canals, the perfect way to unwind from a day of sightseeing or set the mood for a romantic night. Aboard a glass-enclosed boat, cozy up with your special someone while enjoying unlimited wine and cheese and admiring fantastic waterfront views. This is an unforgettable way to experience Amsterdam's UNESCO World Heritage-listed canals!
strTitle: Amsterdam Canals Candlelight Cruise Including Wine and Cheese

strIntroduction: Sail along Amsterdam's stunning canals at twilight and enjoy a delicious pizza as you cruise. This evening tour is the perfect introduction to Amsterdam, and great fun for all the family!

strIntroduction: Cycle through tranquil Dutch countryside on a leisurely 4-hour bike tour, and see the picturesque windmills and fishing villages of the Waterland District. Escape the hustle and bustle of Amsterdam city center for the beauty of the surrounding landscape.
Welcome to the coolest bar in town! Enjoy a few drinks as you discover one of the most unique bar experiences in the city at Amsterdam's Icebar.

阿姆斯特丹超高人氣首選體驗：一定要體驗的巡航之旅＋豪華晚餐！

strIntroduction: Skip the lines and get free transportation and access to top attractions throughout the country with these great package deals. Plan your visit with a free guidebook and enjoy 50% discounts in shops and restaurants.

Find out why Amsterdam is known as the Venice of the North on this one hour cruise.

Beat the queues and enjoy fast track admission to one of Amsterdam’s greatest attractions, the Van Gogh Museum, situated at Museum Square. The ticket also gets you a one hour canal cruise around some of the city’s most atmospheric waterways. Both tickets are open so you can use them independently whenever you wish, enabling you to make the most out of your stay in Amsterdam.
strTitle: Canal cruise with Van Gogh museum

strIntroduction: Explore the scenic Dutch countryside on this exclusive and personal, small group tour. Visit the beautiful fishing harbor of Volendam, explore the iconic windmills of Zaanse Schans, and taste authentic Dutch cheeses at a family farm
strTitle: Dutch Countryside Sightseeing Tour from Amsterdam

strIntroduction: Travel from Amsterdam Schiphol International Airport to your Amsterdam city hotel.

Glide over the fairy chimneys and rock-cut houses of Cappadocia on a 1-hour hot air balloon flight, and get privileged views of the unique landscape from the air. Watch the sun rise over the valleys, and enjoy a Champagne toast upon your safe landing.
Enjoy a full day guided tour in Pamukkale National Park, one of the most interesting places in the world and a UNESCO World Heritage Site.

This 3-hour culinary adventure takes you on a search for the hidden gems of Istanbul’s thriving street food scene. Sample a variety of tasty treats as your guide leads you to the city’s culinary heart, and finish off your tour in the Taksim Square area.
strTitle: Istanbul Night Tasting Trail : Eat and Drink Like a Local

strIntroduction: It’s where East meets West, and a city whose architecture and culture is as diverse as its history. Come and discover Istanbul, its sights and sounds with this combined tour by land and water.

Travel by boat from Istanbul to Büyükada and explore the largest of the Princes islands by horse-drawn carriage. See Ottoman-era mansions, enjoy a tasty lunch at a seafood restaurant, and afterwards take some time at your leisure to explore the island.

Discover the magic of the exotic Orient in this experience straight out of the Arabian Nights including a four course dinner, wine and soft drinks and a spectacular floor show featuring exotic Turkish belly dancers and a traditional Anatolian folklore ensemble.
strTitle: Istanbul by Night : Turkish Dinner and Show

strIntroduction: Visit the ancient city of Troy, immortalized by Homer in his epic the “Iliad.” Travel from Istanbul on this full-day tour, learn about the Trojan War, and gain an understanding of this importance of this site. Breakfast, lunch, and dinner are included.
strTitle: Istanbul : Full-Day Tour of Troy with Entrance Fees and Meals

strIntroduction: Explore the most awe-inspiring areas of Istanbul, one of the single most beautiful cities in both Europe and the Middle East – for it is the city that bridges these two contrasting continents.
strTitle: Bosphorus Morning Cruise and Spice Bazaar tour

strIntroduction: A trip to Ankara is not complete without exploring such ancient sites as the Museum of Anatolian Civilizations.

Enjoy the pleasures of a Turkish bath with this relaxing 2-hour experience in Bodrum. Rejuvenate your skin as you relax in the sauna and enjoy an oil massage, foam massage, and peeling at the Bodrum Hamam.
Discover the beautiful Bodrum Peninsula, fishing villages can be found on the quiet bays of the peninsula

strIntroduction: Now you can witness the enthralling beauty of one of the most popular cities in the world, Istanbul, from air!

Explore Istanbul at your own pace on board a double-decker, open-top, hop-on hop-off sightseeing bus. See all the famous landmarks, from the Hagia Sophia and Blue Mosque to the splendors of the Ottoman Empire, including Dolmabahçe Palace.
strTitle: Big Bus Istanbul: Hop-On Hop-Off Bus Tickets

strIntroduction: The studio is there to provide fun, original, unforgettable experience and long lasting memory of Istanbul for Istanbul travellers. They have a wide range of costumes of different periods during Ottoman Era under the concepts of Dynasty, Millitary and much more.
strTitle: Photo shoot with Ottoman period costumes

strIntroduction: Spend your full day in the amazing Pamukkale with us

strTitle: 1-Way Shared Transfer : Cappadocia Hotel to Kayseri or Nevsehir Airports

strIntroduction: Sail along Bosphorus, enjoy the sights while gliding along the calm water. At last, have a wonderful Turkish night.
Visit Derinkuyu, the largest underground city in Cappadocia and walk through the ancient Ihlara Valley in this full-day tour of the stunning Turkish countryside.
strTitle: Derinkuyu underground city and lhara Valley tour

strIntroduction: A convenient transfer service between Istanbul airports and the city center.

Indulge your taste buds at Develi Restaurant in Samatya, home of authentic Turkish cuisine, and while you eat soak up the atmosphere and enjoy the fine sea views from the terrace. Listed by the Observer newspaper in London among The Best 100 Restaurants, Develi has a well-deserved reputation for consistently delivering the finest in Turkish cuisine.

strIntroduction: Definitely worthy of a place in your holiday photo album, this chunk of central Turkey is all weird rocky cones, valleys and "fairy-chimneys". And on this one-day trip you'll discover this breathtaking region, which men has carved into cave dwellings, churches and cities.

Appeal to all your senses with a one of a kind wine and sunset tour in the truly majestic surroundings of Cappadocia. This three-hour tour with titillate your taste buds with local wine, and leave you captivated by the natural wonders of the Red Valley region of Turkey.
strTitle: Sunset Cappadocia Tour with Wine Tasting and Valley Hike

strIntroduction: Learn how to cook up a storm with a three hour tour and Turkish cookery class using traditional and local products from the ancient region of Anatolia: Cappadocia. Prepare typical dishes such as flat bread, grapes and “pezek” and witness how culinary attitudes have not changed since the nomadic period.

Join a full-day guided tour from Kusadasi and explore the remarkable ruins of the ancient city of Ephesus. Visit the last documented residence of the Virgin Mary, and see the remains of the Temple of Artemis.
strTitle: Tour of Ephesus, House of Virgin Mary & Artemis Temple

strIntroduction: Explore the Valleys and fantastic Fairy Chimneys of Cappadocia on a 3-day package tour staying in 3-star hotel from Side, Belek or Alanya. See the underground city of Saratli Kirkgöz, a whirling dervish show, a pottery workshop and a balloon tour (extra).
strTitle: Cappadocia 3 day tour from Side, Alanya, Belek and Antalya

strIntroduction: Enjoy an exciting day at Vialand theme park, including admission tickets and round-trip transport from Istanbul. With a theme park, shopping mall and entertainment complex, there’s no chance of being bored at Vialand.
strTitle: Vialand Theme Park Day Trip from Istanbul

strIntroduction: Come and discover the heart of this enchanting region and let us take you on the drive of a lifetime.
To find a chance to see the beauty of Pamukkale from another angle with a birdsview, you can just jump into an aircraft and feel the rush of adrenaline with this experience.

Experience stunning and mysterious Topkapi Palace on a 3 hours small group tour with an expert local guide. You’ll have access to all the major areas of interest in the Palace and also enjoy special admission to the Palace Harem on this extended visit.
strTitle: Extended Topkapi Palace and Harem Tour

strIntroduction: Join a local Turkish family for a meal in the heart of Istanbul. What better way can there be for getting an insight into the intricacies of social customs than by joining the locals in the most common – yet special – of situations: eating. This cultural tour also teaches you the secrets of backgammon, invites you to a national beverage in a teahouse, to enjoy a water pipe and more.
See old apartments and visit Byzantine churches in an area of Istanbul with a fascinating Greek Orthodox history. Learn about the Phanariotes and wander through colorful streets with an expert guide.
A convenient transfer service between Istanbul airports and the city center.

Enjoy a fun-filled day on this Unimog truck safari experience. Visit a charming Turkish village and experience truly stunning views of a picturesque dam. Splash about in crystal blue waters, and enjoy a donkey ride on this magnificent day tour.
strTitle: Village and Taurus Mountains Tour by Truck: From Side

strIntroduction: Appealing to the delights of the train watchers and railway buffs among you, spend an afternoon getting acquainted with everyday life of 19thCentury Istanbul with a tour that centres around the famed Orient Express.

Explore the side streets of Pera, the cultural heart of Istanbul, on a 3-hour guided culinary walk. You’ll taste kebabs and sample a variety of Middle Eastern foods and traditional side dishes. Visit Hazzapoulo Passage and have your fortune told as well!
No holidays in Turkey without visiting a Turkish night.

Explore the wonders of Pergamon, an ancient city dating before the 4th century BC. Visit many impressive sites, including the Athenaeum, the second largest library of the Ancient World.
strTitle: Full Day Tour of Pergamon from Izmir and Kusadasi

strIntroduction: The hills are alive with The Original Sound of Music Tour in Salzburg. Enjoy a day trip visiting the breathtaking landscapes and locations where the famous musical, the Sound of Music, was filmed. The English-speaking guide not only shows you the highlights of the film 'Sound of Music' but also the historical and architectural landmarks in the city, as well as a part of the picturesque lake district.
strTitle: The one and only Sound of Music tour since 1967
Schonbrunn Palace Evening: Dinner and Concert

strIntroduction: Light up your night with a dynamic evening sightseeing tour of Vienna, one of Europe’s most elegant cities.
strTitle: Vienna by night, Giant Ferris Wheel and Wine Tavern

strIntroduction: Learn how to dance the famous traditional dance of Austria, the Viennese Waltz. Popularised by the legendary composer Johann Strauss over 150 years ago, the Viennese Waltz conquered the world and today the attendees of millions of balls move at three-quarter time.
strTitle: Learn how to dance the Viennese Waltz

strIntroduction: Complete your trip to Vienna with a visit to one of the city’s many concert halls. Therein you will be able to sit back, relax and enjoy the evocative and timeless music of the world famous composers Wolfgang Amadeus Mozart and Richard Strauss
strTitle: Timeless Tunes of Mozart and Strauss by the Vienna Residence Orchestra

strIntroduction: Let the history of Vienna come alive before your eyes in a unique history show at Time Travel Vienna. You’ll be whisked from Roman times to the present day with a mixture of 5D cinema, imperial theatre, waltzing and rides. Take a trip down history lane!
Step into the enchanting world of in Bratislava

Unlock the hidden secrets of the wonderful Wachau Valley, one of the most beautiful destinations near Vienna. Head off the beaten track through the narrow backstreets and even narrower wine paths, and discover charming villages, picturesque towns and spectacular scenery while learning all about winemaking and the fascinating history and culture of this region.
strTitle: The secrets of Wachau Valley tour

strIntroduction: Elope into the fairytale forests of the Vienna Woods for this morning tour and discover picture-postcard villages, visit the tragic Mayerling hunting lodge, explore magnificent monasteries and enjoy a sensational boat ride on the largest underground lake in Europe.
See all there is to see in the fascinating city of Vienna with this one of a kind tour. A hop on - hop off bus is by far the best and most efficient way of getting to know a city.
strTitle: Vienna hop on - hop off bus tour and guided walking tour

strIntroduction: Cruise the blue Danube to the sound of traditional Viennese music while enjoying a delicious wine tavern buffet dinner. Take in a different perspective of Vienna and see the city light up at night. The tour also covers most of the Danube Canal, which arches south of the old town. This splendid evening tour has a bit of everything that Vienna is famous for: music, food, culture, sightseeing and relaxation.
Ride along a scenic route throughout thick woods and beautifull vineyards on electric bike!

Cruise along the Danube River: a link between Vienna’s trading and cultural past and its pulsating, creative present. As we cruise along you will almost hear the orchestral music of its most revered residents, Beethoven and Mozart.
strTitle: Vienna Panoramic tour and Danube boat ride

strIntroduction: Spend a day around Vienna and visit Schoenbrunn palace to discover the history of Habsburgs. Complete a day tour with a concert in the ornate Orangery!!
strTitle: An evening at Schönbrunn－palace visit and concert

strIntroduction: The Lake District with its natural beauty and exceptional countryside hosted the Austrian Emperor Franz-Josef and his family for their summer vacations. Splendid hunts were held by Salzburgs Prince Archbishops. In this area you will experience the breathtaking beauty of one of Austria s most beautiful regions – the Lake District just beyond the gates of the city of Salzburg.
strTitle: Private Tour: Hallstatt Tour from Salzburg

Experience the natural beauty of the Danube and Wachau valleys with this romantic day trip that takes in charming villages, steep vineyards, ruined castles, magnificent monasteries and during the summer months, a spectacular cruise along the great river itself. This is a tour that has it all: scenery, nature, culture, history and architecture.
Be captivated and amazed by an extensive presentation of the major works of Mozart through his decade in Vienna.
